snippet: Woody Johnson owns the New York Jets but he also happens to be the New York campaign chairman for Mitt Romney’s presidential bid. And as the political season goes into overdrive, his loyalties are being tested.
abstract: Woody Johnson owns the New York Jets but he also happens to be the New York campaign chairman for Mitt Romney’s presidential bid. And as the political season goes into overdrive, his loyalties are being tested.
lead_paragraph: Woody Johnson owns the New York Jets but he also happens to be the New York campaign chairman for Mitt Romney’s presidential bid. And as the political season goes into overdrive, his loyalties are being tested.

headline.main: Woody Johnson Says Presidential Politics Trumps Jets’ Fate
